entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-11-06
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [NativeAOT] support calling UnmanagedCallersOnly functions before managed main() #77957
  • [API Proposal]: MemoryExtensions.AsSpan(this string? text, Range range) #77955
    8.0.0
  • Handling preinstall pre-requivisites #77953
  • [NativeAOT] Document steps for consuming static libraries #77951

PullRequests

Created

  • [NativeAOT] Objective-C: SetMessageSendPendingException and SetMessageSendCallback #77956
    area-Interop-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [mono][wasm] Small cleanups #77954
    area-Build-mono
  • check the right return value for mmap #77952
    area-GC-coreclr

Merged

  • Control if invalid configuration values are swallowed or thrown #77708
    breaking-change, area-Extensions-Configuration, community-contribution
  • Correct typo #77958
    area-Meta
  • Include dependently promoted fields in SSA #77238
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Fix mono arm assert with large return structs #77854
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono, community-contribution

Updated

  • Move the `[With|Get]Element(SIMD)` folding to local morph #76491
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Fix Configuration with IList and ICollection #77857
    area-Extensions-Configuration, 8.0.0
  • Improve IndexOf handling in regex source generator / compiler #77925
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions, 8.0.0
  • Introduce `FIELD_ADDR` and use it for TLS statics and instance class fields #77353
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Allow deleting any kind of nodes after address mode formation #77872
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Split and simplify `fgMorphOneAsgBlockOp` #76793
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Number block assignments normally #77690
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • DNER multi-reg locals early if they cannot be enregistered #77943
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Fix sprintf deprecation error with Xcode 14.1 #77950
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [wasm] Update repository URL in package.json #77937
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, 8.0.0
  • Enable IDE0060 (Remove unused parameter) analyzer #72667
    area-Meta
  • JIT: Slightly relax "const vector propagation" heuristics #76788
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Remove `fgMorphBlockOperand<struct>` #77688
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Don't use IsMatchingConst in Tier0 #77949
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fix timeout in regex test #77817
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions
  • Add XxHash128 #77944
    NO-MERGE, area-System.Security, community-contribution
  • [mono] Added null-checks for LDFLDA on pointers. #77827
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono
  • Add and use a MakeSrcRegOptional that validates IsSafeToContainMem was called #77895
    area-CodeGen-coreclr

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-11-06
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • IDE0055 for comment on new line not indented to comments at end of previous line? #65247

Closed

  • Apply code cleanup changes by document instead of all at the end #34755
    Backlog
  • "Create and assing field" generates code without spaces #60064
    Backlog
  • "Extract local function" generates broken code when applied to base constructor calls #50495
    Backlog
  • 'Apply inline 'out' variable preferences' - invalid output #49714
    Backlog

PullRequests

Created

  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #65250
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Improve `NormalizeWhitespace` for object initializers #65249
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • Allow users to specify only partial accessibility in override completion #65248
    Area-IDE
  • Merge main to features/lambda-default-parameters #65246
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge

Merged

  • Fix extract local in base initializer #65159
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Merge main to features/semi-auto-props #65245
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge

Updated

  • Removed "sealed" from base class #64983
    Area-IDE
  • Re-enable navigate-to streaming with IAsyncEnumerable. #65244
    Area-IDE
  • Is pattern expression with in parameter avoid unnecesary temp in rewriter #65243
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • Split out ref safety analysis into a separate pass after binding #64928
    Area-Compilers

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-11-06
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • QuickGrid: Error building with simple sample #44910
  • Unable to write Integration Tests for Blazor Webassembly (deps.json is missing) #44909
  • Web.config property not working with iOS 16.0+ #44908
  • Rate Limiting: Support for multiple policies on the same endpoint #44907
  • Does .Net Core 6 GRPC support HTTP/3 #44906
  • Perf regression: json #44905
  • Perf improvement: updates #44904
  • Detect if the code is executing for the first time when entering the page in blazor server side #44903

Closed

  • Perf regression: json, plaintext #44893

PullRequests

Updated

  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 1159: Build ID 2038432 #44686
    area-infrastructure

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-11-06
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [SearchBar] ReturnsNonEmptyNativeBoundingBounds (*) fails on iOS #11136
  • OpenAppPackageFileAsync Stream does copy correctly to iphone #11132
  • iOS app fails when deployed to TestFlight using NotificationHubClient #11131
  • Crash on scrolling collection view #11130
  • Unable to change color of BackButton icon in Shell #11127
  • Device Idiom detects Windows as tablet #11126

Closed

  • Cannot create native types when deployment is executed to iPhone from VS for Windows without pairing to MAC #10800
  • App runs fine in Android Emulator or Android Local Device, crashes running on side-installed APK on actual device. #10983
  • Grid row height not calculated correctly when set to auto and used with multiple columns of width * #10956
    Backlog

PullRequests

Created

  • [Windows] Fix tablet mode detection #11135
    community ✨

Updated

  • Consolidate handlertestbase #11021
    area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • [housekeeping] Automated PR to fix formatting errors #10985
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/infrastructure 🏗️

Issues

Created
